description:
PyCon Colombia 2018 is the second edition of the python conference in Colombia. Deborah Hanus, Machine Learning Researcher and entrepreneur is one of the keynote speakers and is inviting us to this great event.

At the event there would be also other amazing keynote speakers such as:

Audrey Roy Greenfeld - Co-author two scoops of django
Daniel Roy Greenfeld  - Co-author two scoops of django
Naomi Ceder - PSF Chair of board of directors
Lorena Mesa - Director at Python Software Foundation
Christine Doig - Senior Product Manager and Data Scientist at Anaconda, Inc
Satya Mallick - Computer Vision Expert, founder of Big Vision LLC.

Some important PyCon Colombia 2018 numbers
3 days
7 Keynote speakers
30 Speakers
+ 15 Workshops
+ 400 attendees
+40 Volunteers

Get your tickets here! https://pyconcolombia2018.eventbrite.com

Síguenos:
https://www.facebook.com/pyconcolombia
https://twitter.com/pyconcolombia
https://www.instagram.com/pyconcolombia/

Mas información en http://www.pycon.co
title: Deborha Hanus - PyCon Colombia 2018
